com.here.android.mpa.mapping

Class MapCircle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.common.ViewObject
      • com.here.android.mpa.mapping.MapObject
        • com.here.android.mpa.mapping.MapCircle

  • public final class MapCircle
extends MapObject
    Represents a MapObject in the shape of a circle.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MapCircle.PatternStyle
      MapCircle.PatternStyle represents available patterns styles for Line or Border.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.here.android.mpa.mapping.MapObject

    • Constructor Detail

      • MapCircle

        public MapCircle()
        Constructs a MapCircle, which is a MapObject in the shape of a circle.

      • MapCircle

        public MapCircle(double radius,
                 GeoCoordinate center)
        Constructs a MapCircle, which is a MapObject in the shape of a circle.
        Parameters:
        radius - Desired radius of the MapCircle, in meters
        center - A GeoCoordinate representing the center of the MapCircle.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if center is invalid.

    • Method Detail

      • setCenter

        public MapCircle setCenter(GeoCoordinate center)
        Sets the center for this MapCircle to a specified GeoCoordinate.
        Parameters:
        center - Desired GeoCoordinate for this MapCircle center.
        Returns:
        The updated MapCircle itself.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if center is invalid.

      • getCenter

        public GeoCoordinate getCenter()
        Returns the GeoCoordinate representing the current center of the MapCircle.
        Returns:
        The current MapCircle center

      • setRadius

        public MapCircle setRadius(double radius)
        Sets a radius for this MapCircle, in meters.
        Parameters:
        radius - Desired radius of the MapCircle.
        Returns:
        The updated MapCircle itself.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if radius supplied is less than or equal to 0.0.

      • getRadius

        public double getRadius()
        Returns the current radius of the MapCircle, in meters. The default radius of a MapCircle instance is 1.
        Returns:
        The current radius of this MapCircle.

      • setFillColor

        public MapCircle setFillColor(int argbColor)
        Sets a fill color for this MapCircle using an ARGB (Alpha/Red/Green/Blue) integer color value.
        Parameters:
        argbColor - Desired ARGB integer color value. The packed integer is made up of 4 bytes: alpha, red, green, blue. Each color component has a value range from [0..255] with 0 meaning no contribution for that component, and 255 meaning 100% contribution
        Returns:
        The updated MapCircle itself.
        See Also:
        android.graphics.Color

      • getFillColor

        public int getFillColor()
        Returns the current fill color for this MapCircle, returning an ARGB (Alpha/Red/Green/Blue) integer color value. Default fill color is solid blue or in ARGB color, 0xFF0000FF.
        Returns:
        The current ARGB integer color value. The packed integer is made up of 4 bytes: alpha, red, green, blue. Each color component has a value range from [0..255] with 0 meaning no contribution for that component, and 255 meaning 100% contribution
        See Also:
        android.graphics.Color

      • setLineColor

        public MapCircle setLineColor(int color)
        Sets a line color for this MapCircle, using an ARGB (Alpha/Red/Green/Blue) integer color value. The default line color is Color.BLUE.
        Parameters:
        color - The ARGB integer color value. The packed integer is made up of 4 bytes: alpha, red, green, blue. Each color component has a value range from [0..255] with 0 meaning no contribution for that component, and 255 meaning 100% contribution.
        Returns:
        The updated MapCircle itself.
        See Also:
        android.graphics.Color

      • getLineColor

        public int getLineColor()
        Gets the current line color for this MapCircle, returning an ARGB (Alpha/Red/Green/Blue) integer color value.
        Returns:
        The current ARGB integer color value. The packed integer is made up of 4 bytes: alpha, red, green, blue. Each color component has a value range from [0..255], with 0 meaning no contribution for that component and 255 meaning 100% contribution.
        See Also:
        android.graphics.Color

      • setLineWidth

        public MapCircle setLineWidth(int width)
        Sets a line width, in pixels, for this MapCircle, an int value within the [0..100] range. By default, the line width is 1.
        Parameters:
        width - Desired width of the line defining the MapCircle.
        Returns:
        The updated MapCircle itself.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - is width is out of range.

      • getLineWidth

        public int getLineWidth()
        Returns the current line width for this MapCircle, in pixels.
        Returns:
        The current line width for this MapCircle.

      • getDashPrimaryLength

        public int getDashPrimaryLength()
        Returns the current length of the primary dash segment of a dashed MapCircle, in pixels.
        Returns:
        The current length of the primary dash.
        See Also:
        MapCircle.getDashSecondaryLength()

      • setDashPrimaryLength

        public MapCircle setDashPrimaryLength(int length)
        Sets a length, in pixels, for the primary dash segment of a dashed MapCircle. By default, the primary dash length is 1.
        Parameters:
        length - Desired length of the primary dash
        Returns:
        The updated MapCircle itself.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if length is less than or equal to 0.
        See Also:
        MapCircle.setDashSecondaryLength(int)

      • getDashSecondaryLength

        public int getDashSecondaryLength()
        Returns the current length of the secondary (empty) dash segments of a dashed MapCircle, in pixels.
        Returns:
        The current length of the empty dash.
        See Also:
        MapCircle.getDashPrimaryLength().

      • setDashSecondaryLength

        public MapCircle setDashSecondaryLength(int length)
        Sets a length, in pixels, for the secondary (empty) dash segments of a dashed MapCircle. By default, the secondary dash length is 1.
        Parameters:
        length - Desired length of the empty dash.
        Returns:
        The updated MapCircle itself.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if length is less than or equal 0.
        See Also:
        MapCircle.setDashPrimaryLength(int)

      • setDepthTestEnabled

        public void setDepthTestEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Set whether to render MapCircle with depth test.

        Rendering with depth test should be used if map object altitude is relevant in your application. Rendering objects with different heights while disabling depth test may cause object occlusion.

        Parameters:
        enabled - true if MapCircle is rendered with depth test.

      • getDepthTestEnabled

        public boolean getDepthTestEnabled()
        Returns a boolean indicating whether the MapCircle is rendered with depth test. By default, depth test is disabled.
        Returns:
        True if the MapCircle is rendered with depth test, false otherwise.

      • setPatternStyle

        public MapCircle setPatternStyle(MapCircle.PatternStyle style)
        Sets new patter style for line/border. IMPORTANT: this is a BETA feature, and is subject to change without notice.
        Parameters:
        style - one of MapCircle.PatternStyle available.
        Returns:
        The updated child of MapCircle itself.

      • getPatternStyle

        public MapCircle.PatternStyle getPatternStyle()
        Method retrieves current pattern of line/border. IMPORTANT: this is a BETA feature, and is subject to change without notice.
        Returns:
        current MapCircle.PatternStyle value

      • setCustomPattern

        public MapCircle setCustomPattern(Image icon)
        Specifies patter image. IMPORTANT: this is a BETA feature, and is subject to change without notice.
        Parameters:
        icon - image to be used as pattern, it is recommended to use icons with dimensions which are pow of 2.
        Returns:
        The updated child of MapCircle itself.

      • getCustomPattern

        public final Image getCustomPattern()
        Returns pattern image. IMPORTANT: this is a BETA feature, and is subject to change without notice.
        Returns:
        Image object with previously user defined pattern.
